title: Share Ownership Weighting and Share Class Inclusion in PACTA
text: order attribute investee companies production climate alignment results financial portfolio weighting method required. methodology note describes share ownership attribution method listed equity holdings. weighting method based individual shares owned investor. possible weighting methods listed equity include equity ownership, weights based market value shares held, voting influence, weights based number AGM votes associated shares held.

title: Share Ownership Weighting and Share Class Inclusion in PACTA
text: Share ownership context PACTA refers act holding proportion publicly listed shares given company. share, also sometimes referred stock, represents ownership stake company confers holder rights share dividends /influence company decision making.

what: 2. The share ownership weight attribution method
title: Share Ownership Weighting and Share Class Inclusion in PACTA
text: share ownership weight method one several methods can used attribute companies production climate performance financial portfolio based percentage companies outstanding public shares held. holdings given entity, share ownership weight defined total number outstanding shares classes shares within scope held investor (numerator) divided total number outstanding shares entity across listed security issuance entity (denominator). listed security issuance denoted ISIN dataset. \[Share \: ownership \: weight = \dfrac{\sum outstanding \: shares \: held \: \: \: investor \: (SC_{eq} + SC_{pf} + SC_{dl} + SC_{cp} + (SC_{ad} \times AD_{cf}))}{\sum outstanding \: shares \: \: \: entity \: (SC_{eq} + SC_{pf} + SC_{cp})}\] :\(SC_{ST}\) Share Class Share Type security held investor (see table 2.1) \(AD_{cf}\) conversion factor required derive number ordinary shares number depositary note shares number outstanding shares held investor provided users, rather financial value shares held, number shares held per security (denoted individual ISIN) must first obtained dividing value shares held market value share.

what: 3. The scope of share classes outstanding
title: Share Ownership Weighting and Share Class Inclusion in PACTA
text: scope share classes included within calculation total number shares outstanding held investor (numerator) total number shares outstanding entity whole summarized table 1.1. share type bridge codes identified proprietary use financial data supplied FactSet. Table 1.1 Scope share classes included within share ownership weight calculation

title: Share Ownership Weighting and Share Class Inclusion in PACTA
text: Depositary notes used US jurisdictions globally enable investors purchase non-US shares issued exchanges jurisdictions. shares purchased bank intermediary issue depositary notes value shares, applying currency conversion factors corresponding adjustment number shares. American Depositary Receipts (ADR) Global Depositary Receipts (GDR) common examples. holder ADR GDR directly hold shares listed securities issuers, instead correspond listed shares purchased depositary banks issue receipts. Case study: BHP Billingdon – US Argentinian depositary notes BHP Billingdon made equity share issue specific ISIN Australian Stock Exchange market. primary issuance listed equity number shares outstanding Billingdon one Australian ISIN. Two issuances depositary notes made ISINs USA Argentina, allowing investors purchase notes equivalent shares bought Australian market. depositary note shares therefore represent proportion total outstanding shares Billingdon Australian market, calculate many conversion factor based currency exchange rate needs applied.  types shares treated? ADR GDR practice represent equivalent indirectly held listed shares. means included investors holdings total numerator. However, conversion factor must applied order obtain correct equivalent number shares. number shares back calculated market value? order derive number shares market value outstanding shares held investor divided market price. conversion factor must applied order obtain correct equivalent number equity shares.

title: Share Ownership Weighting and Share Class Inclusion in PACTA
text: cases, companies make common preferred share issuance available one listed exchange, generally referred dual listing. Whilst issuance exchange distinct ISIN, practice dual listing gives investors one jurisdiction access pool equity (primary listing). Case study: Stora Enso – dual listing multiple share classes Finland Sweden Stora Enso made two primary issuances Finland made available another national listed exchange Sweden. primary issuance traded Helsinski Stock Exchange, dual listed Stockholm stock exchange. depositary note issuance also made USA. two Dual Listed ISIN can seen data mirror two Finnish ISINs. data FactSet shows number shares outstanding 788 million, sum two Finnish traded ISIN. data shows neither shares associated Dual Listings ADR listing included denominator calculation.  However, investor’s point view three last ISIN mirrors first two ISIN. means practice shares, still means investor either owns, entity bought investors behalf, shares first two ISIN, transposition still shares, consequence underlying assets. issuances Finnish ISINs common stocks. , however, differ based shares class. first ISIN class common stocks second ISIN class R common stock results different voting rights. first ISIN 10 votes share, second one 1 vote per share. types shares treated? Whilst shares held investor directly held securities included total numerator, total shares outstanding issued across several exchanges totalled duplication shares caused secondary listings. shares associated primary listing totaled denominator. number shares back calculated market value? order derive number shares market value outstanding shares held investor divided market price.

what: 5. Corporate actions that may result in changes to ISINs
title: Share Ownership Weighting and Share Class Inclusion in PACTA
text: According ISIN organization called ‘corporate actions’ may result changes status company’s securities identifiers1. financial data provider likely take account changes reflect updates financial dataset. However, actions may still need taken account process calculating outstanding shares. Corporate actions relevance identified ISIN include: Company changes name: replacement shares receive new ISIN. company changes country headquartered: new ISIN required company replaces old security new one. Merger acquisition: Old ISINs stock become inactive replaced securities new ISIN. New stock issued changed stock par value: new ISIN needed new stock different rights meant replace old stock.

what: Calculate the number of shares across all equity asset classes — calc_shares_all_classes
title: Calculate the number of shares across all equity asset classes — calc_shares_all_classes
text: calc_shares_all_classes() calculates number shares across equity asset classes. asset class defined value asset_type_id, asset classes included include_types summed. calc_shares_all_classes() assumes input values entity/company, single summed value returned. desired calculate shares classes multiple entities time, typical usage apply function "" entity id, e.g. mutate(data, shares_all_classes = calc_shares_all_classes(shares_outstanding, asset_type_id), .= "entity_id") details see vignette("share_ownership_methodology").

title: Calculate the number of shares across all equity asset classes — calc_shares_all_classes
Calculate the number of shares across all equity asset classes — calc_shares_all_classes
text: shares_outstanding (numeric vector) contains number shares outstanding asset_type_id (character vector) contains asset type identifier include_types (character vector) defines asset_type_id values included sum

title: Calculate the number of shares across all equity asset classes — calc_shares_all_classes

(e.g. Company Name becomes company_name). default, column names changed (.e. FALSE). as_factor logical indicating whether character columns converted factors(default TRUE).

title: pacta.data.preparation 0.1.0.9003
text: Gained functions prepare_abcd_flags_equity() prepare_abcd_flags_debt() prepare (#353). Gained function prepare_isin_to_fund_table() prepare isin--fund lookup table, filtering fsyms 1 row either fund data fund data rows (#352). Gained function prepare_fund_data() prepare fund data, filtering funds data according given threshold adding MISSINGWEIGHT holding difference (#325). added numerous, minor prepare_*() functions (#348). import_ar_advanced_company_indicators() output now includes parental attributes “Company Ownership” tab (#344). import_ar_advanced_company_indicators() gains as_factor arg specify whether character columns auto-converted factor (default TRUE, maintaining previous behavior) (#345). breaking change - write_manifest() now takes pair vectors filepaths input output files, rather set directories (#340).

title: pacta.data.preparation 0.1.0.9002
text: breaking change - prepare_entity_info() new mandatory argument factset_manual_pacta_sector_override internally accessible factset_manual_pacta_sector_override removed (#338). breaking change - factset_manual_pacta_sector_override removed now exported workflow.factset (#338). breaking change - prepare_entity_info() new mandatory argument factset_industry_map_bridge internally accessible factset_industry_map_bridge removed (#336). breaking change - factset_industry_map_bridge removed now exported workflow.factset (#336). factset_issue_code_bridge removed now exported workflow.factset (#335). breaking change - write_manifest() arguments changed allow passing input directory specifically FactSet data FactSet database connection functions removed migrated https://github.com/RMI-PACTA/workflow.factset release version {dbplyr} 2.4.0 greater now required import_ar_advanced_company_indicators() now also imports is_ultimate_listed_parent column (individual companies, entire ownership tree, e.g. `Ownership Level` == 0) somewhat new “Company Ownership” tab. breaks compatibility older PAMS datasets tab.

title: pacta.data.preparation 0.1.0
text: Gained functions quarter_to_factset_timestamp() quarter_to_imf_timestamp(), convert PACTA style quarter string references (e.g. “2021Q4”) equivalent FactSet IMF references (e.g. “2021-12-31” “2021-Q4” respectively) Data scraping functions (get_currency_exchange_rates(), get_ishares_index_data(), process_ishares_index_data(), index_regions) removed extracted new {pacta.data.scraping} package Gained functions: (get_factset_entity_financing_data(), get_factset_entity_info(), get_factset_financial_data(), get_factset_fund_data(), get_factset_isin_to_fund_table(), get_factset_iss_emissions_data(), write_manifest(), dataprep_abcd_scen_connection()) prepare_masterdata gained functionality handle Power technologies without "Cap suffix (#285). factset_issue_code_bridge gained updated mapping FactSet asset_type_code PACTA asset_type (#261). Several changes facilitate new share ownership methodology: (#268) one_adr_eq value own_v5_own_sec_adr_ord_ratio table included get_factset_financial_data() output new function calc_shares_all_classes() added prepare_financial_data() now calculates exports current_shares_outstanding_all_classes column according new share ownership methodology, summing outstanding shares relevant equity classes given entity now depends dplyr (>= 1.1.0) {knitr} {rmarkdown} added Suggests support vignette rendering new “Share ownership weight attribution method” vignette. see vignette("share_ownership_methodology") Workflow script Dockerfile removed/extracted new workflow.data.preparation repo. Bond roll-now calculated. Holdings roll-ed priority FactSet defined credit parent, followed AI defined credit parent (#243). Gained functions prepare_masterdata, prepare_financial_data prepare_entity_info (#235, #236, #237).

title: pacta.data.preparation 0.0.1
text: Added NEWS.md file track changes package.
